body: Listed French artist Louis-Robert de Cuvillon's watercolors are very subtle and delicate. Many of his passionate works such as "Women with a Tambourine", "Women in Exotic Dress", and "Girl with a Fan" have been sold through such venues as Sotheby's New York and Bonhams Los Angeles. This watercolor titled "Reclining Women with Bouquet" is framed in a fine period Art Nouveau scrolled frame.
